channel.title: Prevent Server Crashing
channel.description:
Hello all,
I used a old source and it was pretty much impossible to crash the server. None of the cheat client crashed it, but no I changed sources to a better one (PhoneScape source) and it can be crashed easily.
Can someone help me prevent it from crashing?
